location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 6 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a packet received from Tehran which was being sent to Bassidore [Bāsa’īdū] in the hope that it would catch the Elphinstonethere, and that if not it was to be sent to Muscat to be forwarded on from there.
